name: Nir & Charon
description: Unlike some mythologies "Nir" is an image of the underworld according to the Celestial tribe, Nir which is a large pool filled with people's souls (in the form of colored bubbles) resting peacefully. Where Charon will take the soul to the mouth of 'Roa' the sacred mountain. The souls were swallowed and expelled from the hole of his head, from the shape of smoke to the silhouette of a bird flying towards "Muz" (the eternal place of the noble ones).
